name: Answer Questions
description:
Most time we get distract easily, focus is only weapon to against it.Answer Questions

This game is made for ludum dare 32, the theme goes 'An Unconventional Weapon'. Actually, I dropped my original idea and all pixel art in the last 12 hours, I think I took too long to design the mechanics, or get distract by it. So I decided to brainstorm a new one and here it is. This game perfectly match and present my thoughts, so ... enjoy! :)
